global.error-occurred: An error has occurred. Please, try again later.

login.popover-get-code: If the credentials are correct, you will receive an email with your login code. For security reasons, no notification is made if the credentials are not correct.
login.popover-login-failed: The credentials are not correct. Please, try again.
login.register-success-modal-body: You will receive an email with the instructions to complete the registration process.
login.register-mail-just-sent: A registration email was sent to {email} a few minutes ago. Please, follow the instructions in the email to complete the registration process.

registration.info-password: Please, choose a strong password. It must have at least {passwordMinlength} characters. Try to use a sentence you can remember. Your password will be used to encrypt your secrets. If you forget this password, you will lose all your secrets!
registration.registration-completed: Your account has been successfully registered.
registration.registration-token-not-found: Sorry, the registration code is not valid. Please, start over the registration process again.
registration.registration-token-expired: Sorry, the registration code has expired. Please, start over the registration process again.
registration.password-insufficient-length: Your password must have at least {passwordMinLength} characters.

my-secrets.title: My Secrets
my-secrets.no-secrets: Nothing in my pockets, nothing up my sleeves. Add a secret!
my-secrets.delete-secret-modal-body: The secret will be deleted! Are you sure?

shared-secrets.do-not-self-share: You cannot share one of your secrets with yourself.
shared-secrets.secret-already-shared-with-email: The secret is already shared with {email}.
shared-secrets.secret-not-shared-with-email: The secret is not shared with {email}.
shared-secrets.secret-not-shared-with-you: The secret is not shared with you.

secrets-shared-with-me.title: Secrets Shared With Me
secrets-shared-with-me.no-secrets: Nobody shared anything with you. What a pitty!
secrets-shared-with-me.reject-shared-secret-modal-body: Are you sure you want to reject this secret shared with you?

groups.no-owned-groups: You do not have any groups. Such a loneliness.
groups.participant-groups: Groups To Which I Am Invited
groups.no-participant-groups: Nobody invited you to any group. You must be very mean.
groups.delete-group-modal-body: The secret will be deleted! Are you sure?

trusted-keys.trusted-keys-info: Add here the public keys of the people you trust. This way, when you share a secret to them, you make sure that you are using their public key so that only they can decrypt the secret.
trusted-keys.delete-key-modal-body: The trusted key will be removed! Are you sure?
trusted-keys.key-not-trusted: Please, first introduce the public key of {email} in trusted keys.
trusted-keys.trusted-key-missmatch: The public key received from the server does not match the stored trusted key. Operation aborted.
